item.title: Hugo Migration and some Miscellaneous Updates
item.description: Hey all! It’s been a hot minute, so I thought I’d send out a post to talk about a few updates to the site and some others.

item.title: Astronomy: The Biggest Farse in Science
item.description: Ah, astronomy. The so-called “crown jewel” of the sciences. The field that dares to look up at the infinite void of space and say, “Yeah, we totally know what’s going on up there.” Except, spoiler alert: we don’t.

item.title: Why I Dont Use Web Frameworks
